channel.title: Rune 2H crashing
channel.description:
[font=comic sans ms]Hello everyone. I'm having an issue with Rune 2H on a 317 server.
When I equip it, it seems to crash the client, and freeze it. I have to re-open the client only.
Did anyone every have a problem like this? Does anyone have a solution to this?[/font]
[font=comic sans ms]Problem:[/font]
[IMG]http://prntscr.com/mgulr[/img]
^ [font=comic sans ms]If that doesn't work,
Try this.[/font]
V
[url=http://prntscr.com/mgulr]Screenshot by Lightshot[/url]
